Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: When you make your peace with authority, you become authority

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Violence isn't always evil. What's evil is the infatuation with violence

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: I will thank God for the day and the moment I have

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: And if you see me, smile and maybe give me a hug. That's important to me too

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: What enables us to achieve our greatness contains the seeds of our destruction

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't give up. Don't ever give up

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: I talked about my family, my family's so important

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not happy to be here. I'm just happy to be!

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: How many people do you know who've had their dream come true? You're looking at one

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an absolute maniac, a terrible husband and father

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to go on and be crazy. Craziness is like heaven

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: Excuse me while I kiss the sky

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: Even Castles made of sand, fall into the sea, eventually

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to give people something to dream on

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been imitated so well I've heard people copy my mistakes

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagination is the key to my lyrics. The rest is painted with a little science fiction

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the one that has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes no more time to see the good side of life than it takes to see the bad

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Older and wiser voices can help you find the right path, if you are only willing to listen

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to live happily ever after, every now and then

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I'm still here. Didn't have to go to rehab, and I'm not broke

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it ignorance or apathy? Hey, I don't know and I don't care

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: If life gives you limes, make margaritas

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: We are the people our parents warned us about

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Indecision may or may not be my problem

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm inspired by people who keep on rolling, no matter their age

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I say to you quite frankly that the time for racial discrimination is over

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: You can do what you have to do, and sometimes you can do it even better than you think you can

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: We must adjust to changing times and still hold to unchanging principles

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: America did not invent human rights. In a very real sense human rights invented America

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever starts in California unfortunately has an inclination to spread

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: To deal with individual human needs at the everyday level can be noble sometimes

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless both sides win, no agreement can be permanent

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Aggression unopposed becomes a contagious disease

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: We should live our lives as though Christ were coming this afternoon

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I have often wanted to drown my troubles, but I can't get my wife to go swimming

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is an ice cream sundae, with all the marvelous coverings. Sex is the cherry on top

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody, man or woman, has ever wrecked a good marriage

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I went further on less talent than anyone, but I was a damned good entertainer

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: God is bigger than people think

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Do what you say you're going to do. And try to do it a little better than you said you would

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Sausage is a great deal like life. You get out of it about what you put into it

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a Baptist won't keep you from sinning, but it'll sure as hell keep you from enjoying it

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: You know you're getting old when you go to more funerals than you do weddings

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Have fun' is my message. Be silly. You're allowed to be silly. There's nothing wrong with it

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: You only think of the best comeback when you leave

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing you shouldn't do is try to tell a cab driver how to get somewhere

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: I never sing in the shower. It's very dangerous

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: I became a Yankees fan for a few years. But now, I gotta say, I'm really rooting for the Red Sox

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being absurd. Being silly

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: Sandler's always good. Tom Hanks gave me some good advice

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't act like I was there. I just got into the story

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: I like video games, I like tech, I like being positive

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to North Pole to help out Santa this year

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just looking for an angel with a broken wing

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I always believed in the music we did and that's why it was uncompromising

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I may not believe in myself, but I believe in what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think the critics could understand what we were doing

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't listen to Led Zeppelin that much

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: The benchmark of quality I go for is pretty high

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: The album's not dead for me; I still buy vinyl albums

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't into jazz so much - I preferred things raw

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really know anything about sales figures, to be honest with you

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to have time is to shut down and then do what you want to do

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: Even nice things don't make you happy when you're tired

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's a far more general audience now because I've done more populist stuff on telly

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever situation you are in, that is what is normal for you

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to live in Kent but it's all a question of work

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: It's actually very hard when you're settled in one place to completely uproot yourself and go

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I think some people ramp a side of themselves up for performance purposes

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I must be an anorexic because an anorexic looks in the mirror and sees a fat person

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: You look across the board at comedy quiz shows, and they are mainly hosted by men

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I read that book 'Fat is a Feminist Issue', got a bit desperate halfway through and ate it

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: Loneliness is the universal problem of rich people

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: If life throws you a lemon - make lemonade

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem with beauty is that it's like being born rich and getting poorer

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of having a personal life is not answering too many questions about it

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, even my dressing room at the studio has candles and cushions and cashmere rugs and things

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I really feel now like a native New Yorker. And I'm very happy here

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm extremely happy in my life. I consider myself to be very blessed

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: The easiest way to convince my kids that they don't really need something is to get it for them

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: Age is just a number. It's totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't look my age, I don't feel my age and I don't act my age. To me age is just a number

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always wanted a swimming pool and never had one

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: Life changes in the instant. The ordinary instant

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: Life changes fast. Life changes in the instant. You sit down to dinner and life as you know it ends

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-respect is a question of recognizing that anything worth having has a price

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: We forget all too soon the things we thought we could never forget

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: Grammar is a piano I play by ear. All I know about grammar is its power

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: The writer is always tricking the reader into listening to their dream

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to pick the places you don't walk away from

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: Was it only by dreaming or writing that I could find out what I thought?

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: Late afternoon on the West Coast ends with the sky doing all its brilliant stuff

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: I was smart enough to go through any door that opened

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't excercise. If God had wanted me to bend over, he would have put diamonds on the floor

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: The first time I see a jogger smiling, I'll consider it

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: Never floss with a stranger

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I had a twin, so I could know what I'd look like without plastic surgery

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: I told my mother-in-law that my house was her house, and she said, 'Get the hell off my property.'

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: If God wanted us to bend over he'd put diamonds on the floor

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate reality shows that are not reality

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: My best birth control now is just to leave the lights on

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never felt the constraints of social acceptability

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it a great antidote... lipstick and mirrors and hairspray

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: As soon as you reach a certain age, you're thrown onto a kind of mental scrap heap

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: If you haven't understood that if you are born you die, you scarcely deserve to be able to be alive

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: I switch off lights like a maniac. I drive at reasonable speeds so that I don't waste petrol

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: I was once kissed on the lips by a giraffe, and I don't think I've ever got over it

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something so quiet and so industrious, something so Viking about the Scots

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody tells you Rwanda looks like Tuscany with its tiled roofs

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: Buy an atlas and keep it by the bed - remember you can go anywhere

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm aware of my body

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: Fighting corruption is not just good governance. It's self-defense. It's patriotism

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure at some point in your life is inevitable, but giving up is unforgivable

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: Foreign policy is like human relations, only people know less about each other

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: In the good old days when I was a senator, I was my own man

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: The American people have not become heartless

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality has a way of intruding. Reality eventually intrudes on everything

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest gift is the ability to forget - to forget the bad things and focus on the good

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things I've never been accused of is not caring about people

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: The devastating punch we took on September 11th still reverberates throughout American society

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's just be smart this time. I'm looking for smart

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: Its the name on the front of the jersey that matters most, not the one on the back

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: Besides pride, loyalty, discipline, heart, and mind, confidence is the key to all the locks

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: Success without honor is an unseasoned dish; it will satisfy your hunger, but it won't taste good

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: The will to win is important, but the will to prepare is vital

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: Losing a game is heartbreaking. Losing your sense of excellence or worth is a tragedy

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: Publicity is like poison; it doesn't hurt unless you swallow it

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: The minute you think you've got it made, disaster is just around the corner

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: The name on the front of the jersey is what really matters, not the name on the back

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a wonderful experience here at Penn State

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can lie, you can act, and if you can lie to crazy girlfriends, you can act under pressure

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: People want their 15 minutes and are willing to do anything to get it

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are the greatest, why would you go around talking about it?

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I talk so much about sex that girls just want to meet me

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Never stay in a bad marriage, and don't hang around with psycho coke fiends

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I do cagefight commentary in my spare time

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: If someone plays a brooding actor in a film, people think they're brooding all the time

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: People for the most part can smell lies

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: But it's hard for a chick to do comedy. It's not as open for them

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I really feel like it's a travesty to make a child famous. I really do

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: Know you food, know your farmers, and know your kitchen

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: My imperative is to seek every moment and to live so God is in control

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody trusts the industrial food system to give them good food

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Organic' doesn't mean what people think it means

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: Outrageous behavior, also known as the lunatic fringe, is the seed bed of innovation and creativity

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: We would be a much healthier culture if the government had never told us how to eat

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: We're scared to death to try new things because we think we have to get it right the first time

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: If a job is worth doing, it's worth doing poorly first

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: No civilization on the brink of collapse has ever changed fast enough to avert collapse

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is, everything is eating and being eaten

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I must study politics and war that my sons may have liberty to study mathematics and philosophy

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Power always thinks it has a great soul and vast views beyond the comprehension of the weak

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: The happiness of society is the end of government

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Power always thinks... that it is doing God's service when it is violating all his laws

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Great is the guilt of an unnecessary war

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: A government of laws, and not of men

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: The furnace of affliction produces refinement, in states as well as individuals

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics the middle way is none at all

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't given up on the possibility that sweet reason will prevail

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: Diplomacy is not an end in itself if it does not advance U.S. interests

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: The U.N. is one of many competitors in a marketplace of global problem solving

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as the United Nations

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: North Korea is going to get away with keeping its nuclear weapons

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no religious test under the constitution. That's what it says. Period

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: Politicians, like generals, have a tendency to fight the last war

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe it's my libertarian philosophy: but being in government is hard

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very personal in its politics, very bitter and very negative

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do carrots

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you can do it, you can

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: I go to nature to be soothed and healed, and to have my senses put in order

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: How beautiful the leaves grow old. How full of light and color are their last days

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: Leap, and the net will appear

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: To learn something new, take the path that you took yesterday

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: The Kingdom of Heaven is not a place, but a state of mind

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of happiness is something to do

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't doll myself up for TV because I want people to accept me for who I am

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't learn from your mistakes, then they become regrets

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a cigar aficionado

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: By the time I was 15 and I stepped in the high school gym, I was just stronger than everybody

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: Be loyal to those who are loyal to you. And respect everyone, even your enemies and competition

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether you like me or you don't, I still dig showing up for work

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't play a character. It's totally just an extension of myself

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning the Royal Rumble is as big an accomplishment as anything

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether fighting or spitting, my discipline is unforgiving!

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: Entertainment is often a medium in which you can put yourself front and center

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: The most creative people have this childlike facility to play

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: If God did not intend for us to eat animals, then why did he make them out of meat?

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: I have several times made a poor choice by avoiding a necessary confrontation

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want creative workers, give them enough time to play

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: If life were fair, Dan Quayle would be making a living asking 'Do you want fries with that?'

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be the Dalai Lama to tell people that life's about change

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: He who laughs most, learns best

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: A man will give up almost anything except his suffering

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy always works best when it is mean-spirited

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to write a book which is the history of comedy

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: In my experience, endorsements by public officials, they don't count for anything

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: People are tired of just yelling at the TV set. They actually are going to turn out and vote

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: The enemy is not Islam, the great world faith, but a perversion of Islam

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: When it rains, it pours - figuratively and literally

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't hurt to show some empathy

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Senators will do what they think they need to do to represent their constituents

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Why is it that half of the households in America pay zero income tax? We need some real tax reform

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I think many people simply feel like they don't recognize their country anymore

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: My goal has always been to figure out how we can advance the conservative cause

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who feel a little insecure about our border have some reason to feel that way

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: If your only goal is to become rich, you will never achieve it

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Good management consists in showing average people how to do the work of superior people

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Giving should be entered into in just the same way as investing. Giving is investing

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that thrift is essential to well-ordered living

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Every right implies a responsibility; Every opportunity, an obligation, Every possession, a duty

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tried to turn every disaster into an opportunity

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Competition is a sin

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Education, therefore, is a process of living and not a preparation for future living

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature is the mother and the habitat of man, even if sometimes a stepmother and an unfriendly home

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: The good man is the man who, no matter how morally unworthy he has been, is moving to become better

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Time and memory are true artists; they remould reality nearer to the heart's desire

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Skepticism: the mark and even the pose of the educated mind

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: We only think when we are confronted with problems

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: To me faith means not worrying

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: No man is an island, entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: Love, all alike, no season knows, nor clime, nor hours, days, months, which are the rags of time

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: When one man dies, one chapter is not torn out of the book, but translated into a better language

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: Humiliation is the beginning of sanctification
